website_summaries.verdict: This high-end heated seat is a bidet that can also offer up warm water for cleaning.
pros: Helps cut down on toilet paper use
Remote control operation makes it easy to operate without having to remember buttons to push while you are sitting on the toilet
cons: Does not fit on all toilets

website_summaries.verdict: While expensive, it offers upgraded versions of several premium features, like power-save mode.
pros: Offers one of the best user experiences with its remote control
Consumers appreciate its HydroFlush nozzle, which helps clean the bowl after use
Night light illuminates without being too bright or harsh
Hybrid heating technology offers a consistent warm stream, so no more cold water shock
cons: Instructions could be more user-friendly, and some users say the heating features are too warm even on the lowest settings

customer_reviews.title: Looks fancy but does not even minimally perform.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Due to a muscle disease, a bidet will soon be a necessity so I had high hopes for the BB2000. The biggest issue is that the arm does not extend far enough to actually hit any target. Even on the "Feminine" wash cycle, water doesn't hit the "Posterior" target but mostly shoots up my back. The fan is too weak to dry anything and it's aimed only on the left cheek. The remote is too difficult to understand (has no back-light for night time use) and the printed instructions are too complicated, the pictures too small. I'm sadly disappointed and apparently it can't be returned. It is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: If you like clean you'll love this
customer_reviews.text: Pros: real easy to install but in my case i had a water line and power installed behind my toilet during a renovation, that being said even if i didn't i can't see this as being hard to install. does everything they said it would do! water temp, fan, deodorizer, seat heat, occupied sensor and remote all work perfectly! cons: the seat was a little short for my elongated toilet so i have a extra "lip" sticking out from the toilet rim, tough to find a cleaner that wont damaged the product or void the warranty. price is a bit high, I still love it tho :)
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps TMI, but bought this because as a female (and larger), I sit at a PC up to 15hrs/day and I was experiencing basically baby rash irritation/itching from not being cleansed enough with wads of toilet paper -also the cost, was going through a lot of toilet paper. The product delivers. I feel so much better and no irritation. Temperature control is great. The colon cleansing feature is great for folks who have difficulty with constipation due to some pain meds. Definitely worth the price paid. Only frustration is that when I push for female wash often it does posterior instead and I have to push the stop button sometimes three times to restart.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Holmes

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why we waited so long to purchase the BioBidet BB2000
customer_reviews.text: We love our new Bio Bidet BB2000 and don't know now why we didn't take the plunge sooner. You will never feel cleaner and more refreshed. We compared many different brands, but Bio Bidet was far superior in all features and pricing. Installation was a breeze, no water leaks, but I did use teflon tape on all the fittings. It fits our elongated bowel fine, and is very comfortable to sit on. My only suggestion for improvement would be to backlight the remote control for use at night. Other than that we love our bidet and are thinking about adding a second unit!! Thank you Bio Bidet for making a great product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Marinkovich

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the Toto and remote problems
customer_reviews.text: BioBidet provided good customer service, telling me to buy new batteries since the remote only worked if placed directly by the side of toilet with the receiver. This didn't work and I was getting close to the end of the return period. I had purchased the Toto washlet for a little less than $900 too, and that provides auto seat up/down, and hot air drying. I decided to just order a new Toto s550e. About the only thing it lacks is autoflush. I prolly could have installed but was happy to pay for installation
customer_reviews.author: carbuyr

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Just had my plumber install it becI didn't want to hassle. I watched the steps and it was pretty straightforward, install bracket, disconnect waterling, install t-valve, attach waterling and bidet line, plug into wall and it works with no glitches. Just make sure there's no leaks and your in like flynn. I tried it out today and ran thru all the functions pressure, heat, placement, regular spary, enema vortex, heated seat etc. Works like a charm. If things go agley I'll revise this review. Worth every penny so far.
customer_reviews.author: alex faber

customer_reviews.title: The hole is too small!
customer_reviews.text: It's not comfortable, I'm a larger fellah, and the ramp in the back pushes me off the front of the seat. It's terrible. Worst mistake I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: TOO LITTLE FOR TOO MUCH MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Enema mode is a joke with very little power and the stream in not narrow enough. The LED night light is located outside the bowl on the side where it is basically useless. THIS IS AN OVERPRICED UNIT. Save your money and buy something for less money. Engineering is totally lacking the experience as if they never tested it.
customer_reviews.author: holland515

customer_reviews.title: This product has quality problem
customer_reviews.text: About four years ago we bought a bidet toilet seat from Costco, it worked well until a few weeks ago, its water connection join was broken. We bought a bioBidet BB2000 one week ago for replacement, and this is really disappointing product for two reasons 1) from start water is leaking near the drain button area from time to time. 2) a few times the water pressure from the nozzle is very low. We had to return this product after about a week.
customer_reviews.author: wx8852

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: There is a seam for the cushioned seat on the underside that is almost impossible to keep clean. Other than that it has worked beautifully. My mother was very sick and had incontinence issues, and dementia, this was a life saver it kept her clean and reduced the infections, and rashes, and because of the remote we could control it for her
customer_reviews.author: NJPaul

customer_reviews.title: Bio-bidet or dead bidet ?Only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet seat bidet too bad that it doesnt last long. It stopped working after half a year. I contacted customer service for the warranty. They offer 3 years but the customer has to pay for the shipping to send the unit so that they can evaluate if its manufacturer problem convered by the warranty. Like we were talking about shipping a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Beware the 30 day warrantee
customer_reviews.text: This product worked fine for about three months then it failed to work. GFI kept turning off power to unit. Must be some kind of a short. Second unit had a broken hinge on the seat. Replacement for hinge was about $100. As with most warrantees it was limited to 30 days so I could not get a refund or return. I was hoping to get an exchange but that did not happen either.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but smell.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son's family, but they told me it have some kind of bad smell. Especially after they close the bathroom door for a while, then open the door and walk in. It smell bad even no one use it. I tried to chat with customer service, but it stopped the chat in the middle of conversation. So my son told me they will try another week. If they still can't stand the smell, then they will return or replace it.
customer_reviews.author: cleartell

customer_reviews.title: Short circuit problem causes circuit breaker to trip
customer_reviews.text: The electrical problem started after about 1 month. Can't use the cleaning functions at all because the circuit breaker would trip while using it. I'm pretty sure the max power capacity of the circuit is higher than this bidet (3000W > 1400W). Now I have to contact the manufacturer and see if they can fix this. Shipping cost is NOT covered by warranty, not even in this case. Very disappointed with this purchase. Should've bought other brand with better quality and at least a reasonable warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money and plenty of features
customer_reviews.text: My first, and it has not dissapointed! I went to Taiwan a few years ago and got the full eye opening experience of the Bidet. It truly has been a fantastic experience, the quality and options are fantastic! I took a long time in deciding on this unit after about 2 years of research and going back and forth on getting it or not. I almost made the mistake on going cheaper, and I'm so glad i stepped up and got this particular unit, and i got a good fair price. Easy to install, works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A real butt blaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: East to install. Start of with the water pressure setting at the lowest setting. Use the pulsating and back and forth functions. Move the spray front to read and back. THEN start increasing the power of the spray. If you start on high power you may get an unexpected enema! The only negative is the seat heater could be better. Yeah, it is warm, just barely.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Rapid City

customer_reviews.title: Why hoard TP when you can get this?
customer_reviews.text: My booty loves this bidet. From the adjustable temp, position, variation of pulses, heated seat, and heated drying fan, this bidet has everything you may want. The only caveat I will mention is if you have a bigger than average booty, the seat might be a might small for you. It takes up a bigger area of the toilet area than normal, but the seat opening is smaller. If you don't have a electrical socket nearby, invest in a grounded (3 prong) extension cord and cord clips with 3M tape to keep the cord out of the way. Other than that, installation was easy and the instructions were good.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Don't overthink it, just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna get all TMI here. I was skeptical. But 2020 and the fact that people get all weird about toilet paper when things get dicey - decided this might be a good investment. Guess what, it's amazing! It is one of those purchases you think to yourself - Why in the world did I wait this long? Why have I been resistant to moving out of the 19th century? So yeah just buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. No issues at all. The benefits of the bidet don't seem to vary between brands, but got this because of the enema function. Haven't had to use it, but as long as spending the money, it seems a good idea to have at least one of these in the house. Slight deduction for the remote, as it has no backlighting. So, if you need to use this in the middle of the night, you either have to know the control locations by feel, or turn on a light. Would be nice to have the ability to turn on some kind of low level lighting on the remote.
customer_reviews.author: James Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: yeah, great, but it does not whistle at the moon
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Bought because of medical briefing on lack of arm motion after operation. Post Op was less a problem than stated but Bidet Bliss is a good name. The trade off for bliss is time... the automatic or selected program takes longer than a "manual" operation but it involves only the use of a thumb...choices for wash and dry are varied and can be turned off by a button... although it is not an ejection seat, if you do bail out it stops automatically... and resets awaiting your return. Bottom line, it only lacks mood music.
customer_reviews.author: pluma veritas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bidet, except...
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this as I was at a friend's home recently who bought this. It is fabulous! Except on the Amazon site it did not mention that you need a completely separate inlet box to plug it in, and our nearest plug was about 7 feet away. The electrician came out (for $130) to problem solve and said it would be about $250 to install a new outlet close to the toilet. I just can't afford that right now. Broke my heart to send back this fabulous device.
customer_reviews.author: Jo in AZ

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I looked carefully at two top options, this seat and the equivalent Toto model which was quite a bit more. I had a plumber install this, which I'd recommend to make sure it is done properly and with no leaks. The remote control is quite excellent and appears easy to use and so far, the seat works as advertised and has all of the bells and whistles. The quality appears good and the durability and comfort of the seat are high. I am a larger person and the seat feels stable and well constructed. I recommend it based on our experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Needs alot of work
customer_reviews.text: The spray head movement doesn't work really great, the dryer is useless, more water adjustments in pressure and spray be good, it is bulky. But I will say it has good pressure and cleans, seat warmer is a nice option. Why not make it so you can actually use cleaning chemicals and sit on the lid?... seems to fail in a lot of areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: So...No Good
customer_reviews.text: The remote control does not work. And very uncomfortable and too much for the price
customer_reviews.author: WONSUB JO

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with defective remote.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to finally install it at home but found out that the remote was defective right out of the box, my particular unit only has 2 working buttons that actually do something while the rest just plain doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pongteekayu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Great to Use
customer_reviews.text: I am not a plumber but the installation directions were easy to follow and I was able to successfully install the bidet in a short period of time without problems. Though only having it for a couple of days my wife is getting used to it and so far likes the heated seat, warm cleansing function, and getting used to the drying function. I chose this more expensive product based on the Warranty, product variable functions, and the reputation of the Bio Bidet company. It is a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Dryer Function Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: I’m still going through the learning curve on the bb-2000, but by and large I love it. Except that the dryer function has never worked. I hear a couple of clicks when I turn it on, but otherwise, nothing, no air, no fan. While researching, I’ve found this is a scary common complaint. While not having a dryer is not a deal-breaker, this was a $700 toilet seat, and for that kind of cash, I’d prefer everything works. I can only give this 3-stars for that reason. I shoulda gone with the Toto.
customer_reviews.author: P. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very Disappointed Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very, Very Disappointed, installed it and the seat would not heat - the instructions didn't tell you to lift and put the seat down to make it heat up. Additionally, the water is not warm and honestly, I have just not had the time to call them to discuss the issue in depth. The one email they suggested to reset it which I did to no avail. I have used portable bidets for years, and years but this one Extremely Disappointed:(
customer_reviews.author: Judy Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: What a great find!!! We love this addition to the master bathroom. Great quality, very useful for any family member. Remote control is super easy to use, bidet is efficient, clean, and super easy to install and use. The cord comes out of the right side (when facing bidet), so think of that when purchasing or installing a power source. The cord for us is just a bit too short to go behind the toilet. But it’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: michellenmo

customer_reviews.title: Without going into too much detail this was our best purchase this year
customer_reviews.text: Without going into too much detail this was our best purchase this year. i don't know how we used to get by without it. Water pressure is more than adequate and after 6 months still works fine. the only minor drawbacks are that the first half second of water is cool, then it does stay warm no matter how long you use it. But that first splash is cold and can be a little surprising! also, the drying fan doesn't really do anything. you can sit there all day you are still gonna be wet when you get up. other than these minor drawbacks we are very happy with it and couldn't live without it now.
customer_reviews.author: Scaper11

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install a 68 year old lady could do it.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install a 68 year old lady had no problems at all. It is nice to have the feeling of accomplishment (take that any way you like) of doing it yourself, and the simple installation made that happen. It's a quality bidet with an easy to understand remote.
customer_reviews.author: EllyB

customer_reviews.title: And use for 90 days and continues to be operational
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased and returned another brand due to manufacturing issues, having this model from bio bidet for 3 months now appears that it is the superior model. The first one 1-second or so always ejects a tiny bit of cold water, which seems to be standard. The remote control is well laid out, unfortunately it has no illumination and cannot be viewed in the dark for night use.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new bidet. Great features, comfortable, and easy to use. My only complaint is the seat warmer is too hot. It has three settings, and the lowest one is still uncomfortably warm. I just use energy saver mode, which puts it into an even lower heat setting until you actually sit on it. But it starts warming up and can still get uncomfortable if you stay too long. If the vortex wash is supposed to be an enema, it doesn’t have the power to do the job for me. But it’s still a good exterior wash.
customer_reviews.author: High-Tech Redneck

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options with this bidet!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say About this bidet. The price was much more reasonable compared to other brands. The remote is easy to figure out, lots of functions. The water and the seat are warm and you can change that temperature as well. It was East to install. You need an outlet close by. It does have a fairly long cord but it’s much nicer to have the cord concealed. There is a nite light which illuminated just enough. The remote does not have a light though.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: The BEST BIDET TOILET SEAT PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: This bio bidet is truly the best toilet seat on the market at this price range. It has everything anybody could want in a toilet seat. You can adjust just about every aspect of the toilet from temperature of water, and seat, to spray pressure from the nozzle, and heater. You can also adjust the width and direction of the spray as well. This is truly the pinnacle of bidets, there is not one negative thing with this seat . I highly recommend it, you will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: For the price - Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: 1st, the water heater doesn’t work. 2nd, the entire unit stopped working. For service they require that you remove it and send it back with no replacement or loaner. It took them 3 weeks to repair it and I had no toilet seat while they were repairing the unit. When it was returned it worked once again, but still the water heater does not work. Compared to my Toto this is a distant second place.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tickt

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Bidet seat at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have had many bidet seats. This is a well built feature filled product that’s easy to install and constructed well. The settings are easy to get used to and the product looks nice in my bathroom. The two things I would change are the remote has no backlight and the night light doesn’t appear to shut off on its own during daytime. Maybe I’m not seeing where to change that. I’d also like to have the light inside the bowl as my previous seats have had. Asides for those minor things I don’t think you can get a better product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: acozz23

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" and carry 275 pounds. So a rather large rear-end but I sit nicely on this Bio Bidet Bliss BB2000 Elongated White Smart Toilet Seat. It came nicely boxed with clear instructions. Once you get your old seat off your toilet the rest is easy. I'll try not to get into too much detail here. A couple minutes of warm water is a nice alternative to TP. I'm a happy crapper (that's historically correct).
customer_reviews.author: jjej3

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for my husband after he fell in love with the one in our suite when we vacationed in Hawaii. With a bidet you get what you pay for so I did extensive consumer research. This product did not disappoint. Considering purchasing one for our other bathrooms :) Great water pressure and the heated seats is amazing! Very easy installation but you will need an outlet near your toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Save on TP, use a Biobidet!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several biobidets. This one is good. I just wish it had a nightlight in the bowl, and that I could sit on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: DivaDC

customer_reviews.title: Bio Bidet Bliss BB2000 GET ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Senior never thought much about a Bidet, OMG! What i have been missing out on. I read several reviews and decided on the Bio Bidet Bliss 2000. This is a very high quality unit and the price is reasonable for what you get. The installation is very easy, most people would be able to install if they have an electric outlet near. The remote is easy to understand and has several features. winter is coming up and the heated seat will sure feel good then. My advice to other Seniors GET ONE!
customer_reviews.author: raincrow

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It is a lovely bidet toilet seat, but it should be for the price. I saw some of the pictures of installation and didn't want the chord running across the room, so I had to install a new outlet. I also installed on a single piece American Standard toilet. I think it came out great, but again, for the price, it should!
customer_reviews.author: Randall S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Asset ;)
customer_reviews.text: Never expected to make a purchase like this, butt...it's awesome!!! Wish we had done it years ago. After exhaustive research between Toto and BioBidet, we opted for the BioBidet and so happy we did. Super easy to install, no leaks. Seat and water plenty warm and stays warm. Water pressure is strong and adjustable. Oscillator is a great feature. Remote control is simple...wish nightlight had auto on/off button. The company has been amazing and service great as we wanted a black remote instead of white and they had it to us in 2 days. BOTTOM line, we highly recommend it!!! So worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This really does a great job of cleaning and drying. We frankly thought it would require more than just the product to get t thorough cleaning, but we were pleasantly surprised as how well it works. It was also very easy to install and it is so easy to use. The remote control is excellent. Definitly recommend it to anyone interested in a bidet.
customer_reviews.author: K&ML

customer_reviews.title: If you're on the fence... Jump over and buy one; you will not be dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this model specifically because of the vortex wash feature. It helps clean the remnants out when I'm done pooping. It has truly changed my life. Install was as easy as they say; I'm very meticulous and it still took me less than an hour. I LOVE the heated seat especially in a Wisconsin winter. I can honestly say that this is one of the best purchases I made in 2018. The only problem is, now I can't "go" anywhere else. How can I be expected to use toilet paper now? It's so barbaric.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Gehrett

customer_reviews.title: After 25 years of using bidets, this is the finest Bidet we have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: At last, a bidet that actually cleans with a choice of water power, left and right movement and temperature adjustment. It never fails to clean perfectly the first time. We have other bidets that we had to repeat the cycle four or five times. I wish the remote control had a LED light. It is difficult to see as it is. It could be that I am 87 and don't see like I once did. I still rate this the best bidet we have ever used..
customer_reviews.author: Bud Morrell

customer_reviews.title: New bidet kinda like the old one
customer_reviews.text: I love the Biobidet seats and now own 3. I will say the installation didn’t go well because I didn’t have the correct plumbing parts. The remote is A LOT. Not “guest” friendly. I do like the speak features of this seat. I don’t really see a huge difference from the original seat I purchased to this new seat. Cleans about the same. It does have continuous warm water and the night light. Those are great features. The remote really could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Doyle

customer_reviews.title: 3-year warranty, Very Nice, Extra Easy to Install...Easily less than 10-minutes
customer_reviews.text: VERY Happy with this item and its 3-year Warranty is the best and longest I found on Any of the Bidets I researched. I just wish the remote was Backlit and another 1" to 1-1/2" of elongation to the seat would be appreciated. Amazon advertised the price at $529.00 and it was still $529.00 when I put it in my Cart, 5-minutes later when my daughter placed our complete order.... Amazon had Jacked-Up the price to $798.00. It took a lot of ARGUING with Amazon but I finally got a credit for the Bait & Switch Over Charge.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I am delighted with our new BB2000 BioBidet!
customer_reviews.text: The BB2000 was recommended to us by our next door neighbor as a solution to drain clog challenges of older homes in our neighborhood, given today's low water flow toilets. Availability challenges with toilet paper because of COVID-19 provided another incentive. But beyond these two reasons, I am delighted by the primary sanitary purpose of the device! Installation was straightforward and the operating instructions were clear in the manual. I strongly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and cleans all the nasty
customer_reviews.text: Talk about clean and convenient. Don’t know how I lived without one of these. Still use paper to check if I’m dry back there but it’s always clean as a whistle. Just love this thing so I bought another for our second bathroom. Use a lot less toilet paper for sure. Actually don’t need any cause this thing blows dry hot air. Seat can be warm, water too. It’s awesome. Stand up and it shuts down. Too easy to wash my bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy the Lamborghini of bidets! We used to have a normal bidet in the bathroom. A friend of our bought this because her husband had Parkinson’s and this gave him more freedom towards personal hygiene. We remodeled our bathroom and I bought this to add space to our bathroom since I was removing the bidet. My husband was completely against the idea...until he used it... Now we are remodeling the other bathroom and I bought another. He says he can’t live without it now that he knows about it. Soooo easy to install. Worth every cent!!
customer_reviews.author: Dina McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: First, I would like to congratulate the people who wrote the installation instructions. Not that installation was difficult, but the instructions were clearly written and accurate, a huge departure from most things these days. Besides being easy install, the bidet operates exactly as advertised. I am actually pleasantly surprised by the deodorizer function. I had low expectations, but it works great. I’m not sure why some of the reviews on this product are low. I feel like those people either got a faulty unit out of the box, or they just like to complain. The remote seems like a lot, but it really isn’t difficult to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Really gets me clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself a BioBidet BB-2000 for the Solstice, although I was skeptical that it could really get me clean. However the first time I used it I was pleasantly surprised when it rinsed me with a nice warm stream, which I made oscillate and pulsate, for several minutes, enough to do a thorough job. Then it blew a warm stream of air (temperature adjustable) for several minutes, until I was thoroughly dry. No need for TP. Moreover it cleaned me much better than TP could ever do. It's a wonderful and very useful machine.
customer_reviews.author: DavidP

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED WITH THIS BIDET SEAT
customer_reviews.text: I WAS LOOKING FOR A BIDET TOILET AND CHECKED OUT SEVERAL BRANDS. WITH MOST OF THEM, ALL THEIR BIDET FUNCTIONS WERE DONE WHITHIN THEIR TOILET SEATS. THE TOILET PART, BOASTED OF SUPER FLUSH, OR A SUPER COATING SO NOTHING STUCK TO THE BOWL. THIS I DID NOT NEED BECAUSE MY EXISTING TOILET WAS FINE. THE PRICE OF THESE TOILETS ARE FROM $2K TO $7K. THIS BB2000 DOES EVERYTHING THAT THEY SAY EXTREAMLY WELL AND FOR LESS THAN $600. THE INSTALLATION WAS VERY EASY. I WAS CONCERNED OF THE SPACE THAT IT WOULD TAKEUP ON MY TOILET, BUT THIS WAS NOT AN ISSUE AT ALL. THANK YOU BIOBIDET.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product! I had a very similar product I purchased from them about 10+ years ago and it stopped working on me so I decided to go with the 'same' (obviously newer model). The remote is larger than our old one which was inconvenient for us because we build a slot in our wall for it but obviously that's our issue. Their new remote works great just a lot bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Cheng M Shu

customer_reviews.title: ... nothing to compare it with but we are extremely happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is our first Bidet so we have nothing to compare it with but we are extremely happy with it, just wish we would have gotten it years earlier. It cleans very well and the fan does a very good job of drying, no need for paper at all. I do leave it on for the full three minutes, however, my wife is impatient so she uses paper to dry. The one thing I would love for it to do is use soap for the first half minute or so....then powder would be nice after drying... My only concern is how well it will hold up and how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Evans

customer_reviews.title: This Biobidet is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a bidet but thought it not a necessary item. Now that I have this one, I will never be without it again. My husband easily installed it for me. I love the remote and all the choices. I love the heated seat now and look forward to this winter never having to sit on a cold potty again! There are so many nice features on this bidet. Front wash, back wash, warm water, cool water, whatever you wish! Warm air dryer! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: A great solution to a toilet paper shortage
customer_reviews.text: This Bidet is awesome! It has so many features and works perfectly. It was so easy to install as well. Just need to make sure you have a power outlet close to where you are going to install it. We had to add an outlet behind our toilet bowl. The massage feature is really nice as well as the fan to dry. I highly recommend if you're looking to get a bidet.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for the quality & price.
customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome. The installation was not that difficult but could have been easier if the instructions would have been included along with the short stainless braided water hose & the 3-way connector. This was surly an oversight for such a quality product. I opted to go purchase the missing items instead of waiting for them to be shipped.
customer_reviews.author: kirk P

customer_reviews.title: I ended up returning this.
customer_reviews.text: i did not like how hard it was to program. I needed something much easier.
customer_reviews.author: C Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Bonus-flex spend
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery which limited my range of motion. My husband thought I was crazy to get "this" as it would not be used after surgery. Thinking outside of the box, I thought I would submit a claim with my insurance company to cover as a medical equipment. Within 3 days of me installing the seat and using it with an orange extention cord running across the bathroom floor, we got insurance approval and the electrician was over that afternoon!!! Be sure to give it a practice run/test drive to figure out and save your settings so that your back side and toilet seat cover stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: William Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and works great. No problem
customer_reviews.text: Am a 73 female and installed myself just follow instructions. Plan on buying 2 more. One is just not enough!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Better than the more expensive brands. Eady self installation
customer_reviews.text: The multi features Work perfect for all genders. Easy self installation. Better than the more expensive bigger named brands. Only negative is that the hand control take AAA batteries that'll have to be changed because you will enjoy all the different features and personal set up functions.
customer_reviews.author: JunBaudelaire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Compared this to the Toto SW3036. I felt this was a more sturdy and comfortable feeling seating position than the Toto. More importantly I felt the cleaning mechanism was better with more options and more strength. Also, it is less expensive, and has the side controls and night light. The biobidet is a well-made, effective product, that easily stands up to the industry leader.
customer_reviews.author: Noyty

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We owned a BB1000 for 8 years. We loved it, very good bidet. But, lately it started to have some issues.,so we decided to get us a new one and maybe an improved one. Im so glad i found BB2000. I know that not everybody likes how the water pressure is but, to us is better, the way it comes out is wider, washes you better (in my own opinion) like i said before, i owned the BB1000 for YEARS and i like this one better. Good improvement, I see it being a part of my family for many many more years :) Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could want in a bidet but price was too high
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy to use controls, instantaneous warm water, simple installation . I've read other reviews that seemed to indicate low water pressure, I suspect that is because their incoming water pressure is low. Mine has plenty of pressure. You will enjoy this unit. Price comment is that a bit over one month later is see it listed at $499 on Bidetking. So much for Amazon's low price gaurantee
customer_reviews.author: Past Behavin'

customer_reviews.title: Best Bidet
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty easy to install. I dont have an elongated toilet, so not an exact fit, but still works. Initially bought this to help my elderly Mom to clean herself. She doesnt know how to work it, but we started to use and enjoy it. Just the heated seat was worth it during winter.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Edralin

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a bargain seat a few years ago from another maker and never used it much, mostly because of the cold water shock to my system. That being said I tried again because I struggled with cleaning up without using half a roll of paper. I am so glad I picked this one. It works miracles, It does what it suppose to do. The seat warms instantly. No cold water shock. And with a little adjusting it hits and cleans what it’s supposed to. My wife loves it and grew up where bidets and washlets were common, I am a converted rookie.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to another dimension!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. This is the first time I own one of this (years ago I had a Japanese brand) and having a bidet again makes a total difference. The product looks and feels high quality. The fan is very quiet and overall it makes you feel you are in another dimension (for good). It is easy to install although I also looked at you tube videos to make sure I was doing the right thing. Don't think twice!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: What a great purchase, I love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bidet not solely because of the "Corona TP Crisis" but mainly due to a trip to Europe last fall where bidets are very commonly used and available in their hotels. If you haven't experienced using a bidet they are wonderful and great for the environment too so win/win. Obviously the mechanics and cost associated with changing out an entire toilet unit in my rented home was not an option so finding the BIO bidet that was quick to install and set up was exciting. This product works great and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mark mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Installation not difficult at all, remote user friendly and great features.
customer_reviews.author: MelleB

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The position of the nozzles are adjustable. Also the force of the spray is adjustable. The energy saver mode keeps the seat slightly warm till you sit. My only criticism is that the remote should have the option for two people to have their own personal setting. Also, adding Alexa would be helpful...
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning after using toilet so much better.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with help from electrician for outlet and a young talented friend. It works great for cleaning after using toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Taplin

customer_reviews.title: Feeling very clean
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Relatively easy to install. Biggest issue is likely to be the distance to the nearest outlet. In energy saver mode, the water will start out cool, then progress to warm within 30 seconds. Using a lot less toilet paper now.
customer_reviews.author: DOc

customer_reviews.title: Two Years Old and going...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Got used to these seats while traveling in Asia and once you use one you will never want to to back to caveman days. Would have given 5 stars except the side buttons no longer work (I never used them anyway).
customer_reviews.author: donsabai

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner and healthier buttholes
customer_reviews.text: Healthier and Clean butts for sure. Our only gripe is the seat positions you more forward on the toilet, so unless you have a steep inner bowl design poo get caught on the ridge and doesn’t easily flush. Totally Gross and requires multiple flushes. That said super clean and healthy butts.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: I have a very Sensitive Darier. It took a bit of getting use to but it works perfectly. It doesn't completely dry unless you want to sit their 6 minutes so I'd keep the Toilet paper handy. By the way the Turbo mode will Definitely wake you up
customer_reviews.author: chris callahan

customer_reviews.title: Why don't these come on all toilets?
customer_reviews.text: My parents are getting older (80's) and thought that this would make things easier for them. After installing one in their home everyone of us that have tried it have bought at least one. This is one of those things that you never think of until you have tried one and then it's hard to live without. The BioBidet is the best and this model is the best we have tried. 3 in the family have switched out other brands for various reasons all now own the BB2000 now.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy one
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Should have got one a long time ago. The seat is a bit smaller but with less wiping it’s not such a big deal. The remote functions are kind of confusing but you get used to it. The fan needs to be a lot stronger, you will still need to dry off. Unit came without a remote, I gave them a call and they shipped a new one for free, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Suggested and I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: More than a month has gone by since the Dr. suggested a bidet and tonight I sit here wishing I had made the purchase then. I don’t think I’ve ever investigated a product to this degree and I went with BioBidet Bliss BB2000 because of the features, the overall reviews and questions that allowed me to further my research and of course price was a consideration. I may have over planned for the install - super easy. Love it! Now to figure out how to make everything work.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent controls, you can adjust everything, water temp, pressure, spray angles, and even different types of spray patterns and a seat warmer which i don't use but it has it. . This is my first bidet and i love it!!
customer_reviews.author: William Haywood

customer_reviews.title: need more documentation
customer_reviews.text: even the lowest pressure, it is still very high and sometimes, it is painful for my skin. I prefer to use the auto-wash but it last for 30s including for nozzle coming out. so you only have 25s for washing. I have to press auto button for a couple of times to get a fully clean. there is no way to set time on the remote either. the document was really bad. it is not worth for the price.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: They have a confident guarantee
customer_reviews.text: They think their product will work and keep working. And they offer a money back guarantee. On a Bidet!!!! So why? Because its terrific. Very little chance that someone will return it. I bought 2. And when I called with a question, the person who answer the phone was the one qualified to answer my question.
customer_reviews.author: Laird Wh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy installations and works great
customer_reviews.text: Personally I like the bio bidet 2000 I originally purchased for my wife. Works very , but still have to use a little bit of toilet paper to wipe up afterwards but overall great product. Still trying to get a little bit used to the controls and I wish I was a little cheaper but overall I think it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love using our new bidet
customer_reviews.text: We love the different spray choices! My wife had to have a section of her colon removed, and the bio-bidet is helping her immensely to be able to fully empty her bowel. I have a bad shoulder, and reaching around my backside to use toilet paper is painful. The bio-Bidet has greatly improved our lives and comfort levels!!!
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Best Bidet seat out there!
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review on anything I’ve ever ordered on Amazon. Been a Prime member for years and weekly have an order arriving at my house. The BioBidet Bliss BB2000 is great. Warm seat, warm water and clean butt!! Installation was a piece of cake. Just get you butt positioning right and let it do it’s thing! Pressure is fine. Some people might prefer more but for me it’s all That I need. The oscillating feature is great! The dryer fan does it’s job as long as you can sit for the 5 minute timer to dry your butt. See you later TP!!
customer_reviews.author: David S. LeRow

customer_reviews.title: Great product terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I must admit after trying three different products this was the best but I give Customer Service a one star I was on the phone to ask a question I was on hold for 30 minutes I got the person I asked her the question she hung up on me and put me back into rotation and for another 30 minutes no one ever got back to me the worst customer service I’ve ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Mercedes of bidets feel clean& dry
customer_reviews.text: Love the bidet Gives a good spray & fan dries excellent saves on toilet paper I would have given a 5 star for the remote if It would light up & I could see it at night without having to turn on the light &The spray takes a cupped seconds to warm up but i love this bidet !!!!
customer_reviews.author: janette salameh

customer_reviews.title: best seat in the house
customer_reviews.text: I put this toilet in myself, it was easy to do, came with great instructions- parts not complicated. Now the toilet seat itself is amazing, yes its expensive, but it built to last!
customer_reviews.author: David L Stark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but buy direct from Bidet King
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Was a bit of a challenge finding a toilet that I liked that would fit it, but in the end am very pleased. BTW I returned mind purchased and ordered direct from Bidet King, saved myself over $100.00. I was shocked to find that Amazon was ripping its customers off so badly.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gale

customer_reviews.title: A life changer!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased the BB2000 after I urged him to research bidets. I have had IBS for so long I can't remember not having the problem. I've been on medication before and have really just endured my problem and kept going. Little did I realize having this bidet would truly change my life! It should be prescribed by doctors who have patients like myself just putting up with bowel problems. I thought having a bidet was just a luxury but now I know it is far more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C.

customer_reviews.title: BioBidet is so great! Fantastic and perfect somehow don't seem laudatory enough ...
customer_reviews.text: BioBidet is so great! Fantastic and perfect somehow don't seem laudatory enough because I've had such overwhelming problems with two other brands. If you're looking for this type of seat -- and as an aside, this type of seat is just the most comfortable and hygienic experience -- this is the one to get. Depending on what your particular desires are, they have a model to suit. This one is very inclusive. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dorrie

customer_reviews.title: The water tank has a continuous leak from the drain valve.  sadly the unit i got is defective
customer_reviews.text: i noticed an issue when the water never got hot and when i opened seat up i notice a continuous leak from the tank drain valve. im trying to see if it can be fixed or if i have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Clean as a whistle!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what a bidet should. Read the title of this review.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Most popular seat in the house!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this past week. Works great! It has become the most popular seat in the house! Easy to install, simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Medical Rock Star

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, is it worth the money? Yeah...
customer_reviews.text: We love this purchase and would recommend it ( have recommended it) The only thing I dislike about it is the temperature of the seat does not cover the whole seat. I think everything else is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan and Daria

customer_reviews.title: What a great way to get clean!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this unit today. I have never used a bidet before. I am very impressed. I suffer from hemorrhoids and the warm water is very soothing. I now have a new seat in the house! lol
customer_reviews.author: digitalman1961

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the unit. Installation took 30 min or less. Easy to install... Followed the instruction manual. It feels like a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and luxury design
customer_reviews.text: Due to COVID-19 Pandemic, we decided to purchase and install Bio Bidet to reduce the usage of toilet tissues. It was easy to install and it works well for our family needs not only for saving the use of toilet tissue but also for keeping us healthy. Top qualify product with higher costs, but it is worth for the costs. Luxury design with remote control with various functional options, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshep Kim

customer_reviews.title: Heat in Winter
customer_reviews.text: I really love bidets ever since a trip to Japan. I like this one has a remote so that if you have kids, you can make sure it’s out of reach. And in the winter time, it’s nice to wake up and sit on a heated toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bio Bidet Bliss BB2000 Elongated White Smart Toilet Seat, Premier Class, Unlimited Warm Water, Vortex Wash
product_meta.description:
Size:Elongated| Style:BB-2000The highly anticipated premier bidet class unveils a groundbreaking new breed of cleansing technology. Experience the distinction between the limitations of the past and the technological freedom of the Premier Bidet Class with a vast selection of cleaning methods and witness the latest level of unprecedented cleanliness with the exclusive inside-out nozzle cleaning technology. Know no boundaries in reaching your highest level of personal hygiene with a Bliss series bidet.Hybrid On-Demand heating system

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The highly anticipated premier bidet class unveils a groundbreaking new breed of cleansing technology. Experience the distinction between the limitations of the past and the technological freedom of the Premier Bidet Class with a vast selection of cleaning methods and witness the latest level of unprecedented cleanliness with the exclusive inside-out nozzle cleaning technology. Know no boundaries in reaching your highest level of personal hygiene with a Bliss series bidet.
feature_bullets: 3 IN 1 STAINLESS STEEL NOZZLE - Offers posterior, feminine, and vortex washes, improves hygiene
SMART SEAT-SMART DECISION - Streamlined comfort-adjustable heated seat and water, slow closing lid
ECO FRIENDLY- Energy Save Mode, reduces electricity and toilet paper, good for the environment
FEEL THE DIFFERENCE - Oscillating wide clean and pulsating message technology with bubble infusion
HYBRID HEATING TECHNOLOGY - Offers continuous warm water during your entire experience
